attributes.action: ALLOW A FAIRER SYMSTEM OF ROAD TAX FOR PETROL AND DIESEL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ROAD TAX RULES NEED TO BE UPDATED FOR PETROL AND DIESEL CARS I SUGGEST THE CO2 EMMISION READING ON YOUR V5 LOG BOOK WILL BE THE NEW AMOUNT TO TAX ANY PETROL OE DISEL CAR FOR 1 YEAR EXAMPLE 2005 05 BMW 116 SPORT C02 181 G/KM SO ROADTAX WOULD BE £181 FOR ONE YEAR,CARS RUNNING ON ELECTRIC, LPG GAS OR BIO FUEL ROAD TAX 50% LESS. TO LOOK AFTER OUR HERITAGE CARS ANY CAR OLDER THEN 30 YEARS OLD FREEROADTAX REG BEFORE 1 APRIL 1978 I COMMEND THIS PROPOSAL TO YOU ANY NEW VEHICLE PRODUCING MORE THEN CO2 300 G A ONE OF TAX OF £1000

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
